Đóng góp ý kiến dự thảo văn bản


<script type="text/javascript">
$(function () {
	var date = new Date();
	var dateCount = new Date(2018, 0, 1);
    var minNumber = 200; // The minimum number you want
    var maxNumber = 1000; // The maximum number you want
	if(date.getHours() < 6 || date.getHours() > 22){
		minNumber = 5;
		maxNumber = 50;
	}
    var randomnumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * (maxNumber + 1) + minNumber); // Generates random number
    document.getElementById("myNumber").innerHTML = randomnumber; // Sets content of <div> to number
    
	//Tong luot khach truy cap
	var seconds = date.getTime() - dateCount.getTime() + "";
	seconds = seconds.slice(0, -3);
	var output = seconds;
	var length = Math.floor(seconds.length/3);
	if(seconds.length % 3 == 0) length = length - 1;
	for(var i = 0; i < length; i++){
		output = [output.slice(0, seconds.length - (i*3) - 3), ",", output.slice(seconds.length - (i*3) - 3)].join('');
	}
	document.getElementById("lblLuotTruyCap").innerHTML = output;
	
	return false; // Returns false just to tidy everything up
	
});
</script>
